description: Try our easy to follow Veggie & Rice Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable bake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Budget,Zucchini,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Rice,Peanut free
name: Veggie & Rice Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Grease and line a 20cm square pan or ovenproof dish. Heat oil in a large frying pan, over medium heat. Add onion and garlic and cook gently for a few minutes or until soft. Add the carrot and zucchini and cook, stirring occasionally, for 3 minutes.
Transfer to a bowl. Add rice, egg and 1 cup of cheese and season to taste. Stir well to combine.
Press mixture into pan. Top with remaining cheese. Bake for 35 minutes, or until mixture has set and top is golden. Cut into squares or slices.
